review_data.title: A restaurant offering most tasty Italian and international dishes
review_data.content: We chose this restaurant by chance.However, we were not disappointed. The Italian food is original and excellent, not only looks nice but really tastes well. The service is very good and the price is reasonable. The restaurant offers a really good and wide selection of...More

review_data.title: Decent local neighborhood Italian restaurant
review_data.content: Every month my team from work go out for lunch to a new reatuarant, which provides me a chance to check out - and rate - new places. La Pergolina is a small family run restaurant, and the atmosphere is very cozy and friendly. The...More

review_data.title: Intimate place to eat a nice italian meal
review_data.content: A small restaurant in the quiet part of Weinbergstrasse, ran by a family. Basic good Italian food. It seems that they use very high quality ingredients, very tasty, attractively served. You can seat either inside or out on the balcony. The waiter is probably the...More
